ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Blueprints
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the Vault-Tec Blueprints as a prerequisite for the most advanced vault acomplishments

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault furniture for the most highest demands.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Education
ResearchProjectDef.description: The G.O.A.T provides what is needed to determine a vault-dwellers future. Provides school tables which allows the edication in specific skills which are necessary in a vault.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Luxury Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault furniture for the most highest demands.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Medical Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-tec medical equipment is made to meat highest standards.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Nutrifier
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows acess to a Vault-Tec stove which allows the production of Vault-tec meals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Production Techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec producing methods allow the vault to provide all amenities which are needed for an adequate vault

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Recycler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec recycling methods allow the most efficient reuse of what would otherwise be considered to be waste

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Consumables
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some things cannot be produced via natural means and must be synthetized by the use of chemicals and other ingrediences to immitate what has been lost during the great war.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Synthread Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec producing methods allow the vault to provide all amenities which are needed for an adequate vault

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Neutroamine Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec producing methods allow the vault to provide all amenities which are needed for an adequate vault

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec High-Tech Hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec High-tech Hydroponics allow any plant to grow within the vault, requires however extensive materials and energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Plasteel Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec producing methods allow the vault to provide all amenities which are needed for an adequate vault

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Medicine Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec producing methods allow the production of Vault specific medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Mega Drill
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Vault-Tec Mega drill allows special resource acquisition

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Uranium Drilling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the Mega Drill to drill for uranium

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Silver Drilling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the Mega Drill to drill for silver. This process however is extremly slow

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Gold Drilling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the Mega Drill to drill for silver. This process however is extremly slow

ResearchProjectDef.label: General Atomics Reactors
ResearchProjectDef.description: General Atomics reactors are not. But together with Vault-tec, they become something enchanting!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Super Reactors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec super reactors are the most efficent known. Quality Guaranteed by Vault-Tec!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sure Power Geothermal Generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sure Power is a pre-war company which has designed the geothermal power sources of many vaults, where the geological properties of the local caves made it invaluable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Accumulator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec Accumulators are the most efficent ones known. Quality Guaranteed by Vault-Tec!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault-Tec Security
ResearchProjectDef.description: Vault-Tec Security turrets can provide safety to a vault much more than many other security measures. Quality Guaranteed by Vault-Tec!
